name: json-stringify-date
description: Like JSON.stringify, but preserve timezones in date objects and parse dates into Date object

scripts.postversion: npm run changelog && npm run build && npm run retag && npm run push
scripts.test: npm run test:release && npm run test:build
scripts.test:release: npm run test:lint && npm run test:coverage
scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:browser
scripts.retag: export GIT_TAG=$(npm run env | grep npm_package_version | cut -d '=' -f 2) && git commit -a --amend --no-edit && git tag -f $GIT_TAG

author: Filipe Constantinov Menezes <fcmenezes87@gmail.com>
